message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Alice, my turn.  Let's be practical, this round it is 70/30 or next round the pot shrinks significantly.
The pot is shrinking, Bob. Let's be reasonable and end this now.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a hit on inflation.  Take 40 now, or watch the pot shrink further.
Last offer, Bob. This is a one-time deal before the value drops further for you.
